New LLB Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select File»Save or File»Save As to save a VI and click the New LLB button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to create a new LLB.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Name of new LLB—Enter the name of the new LLB in this field.
  • Create—Creates the LLB and displays the File dialog box.
